descriptor.name: Yuukke Market Place
descriptor.short_desc: As a marketplace seller, Yuukke operates by listing products from various categories on a centralized platform where customers can browse, compare, and purchase items seamlessly. Yuukke acts as an intermediary between buyers and sellers, providing a unified platform that simplifies transactions and streamlines logistics.

descriptor.name: Girls Peach Sparkle Party Dress
descriptor.short_desc:
This girls peach sparkle party dress is made from soft net 
fabric featuring stunning sparkle work that adds a magical touch Its 
beautifully accented with a dazzling diamond belt making it perfect for
 any special occasion Your little one will shine brightly and feel 
fabulous in this enchanting dressHow long take to deliver order in indiaWe deliver order within 35 days from the date of orderedfree shipping in indiaFeatures

Material Net
Color Peach
Type Frock
Length Knee
Occasion PartyFestive
Wash Care Dry Clean Only Disclaimer 

Special Note Optional 
accessories worn by the model are for styling purposes We reserve the 
right to provide complimentary accessories according to the availability
 at the time of dispatch if mentioned under the product description and
 applicable We dont provide wings  and stick or any sort of hair accessories with this dress  Model is wearing only for styling Model is wearing short length for look and styling  We recommend to crosscheck length before order as per the desired look Slight variation in color is possible due to digital photography
